ModMetaData.name: MorrowRim - Telvanni Spiders
ModMetaData.author: SirMashedPotato
ModMetaData.description:
Learn to create and weaponise elemental spiders, in the first module for MorrowRim - Telvanni Technology.

Encounter albino spiders in a new incident, and kill them for a chance of obtaining an albino spider pod. Alternatively, if you have a good grower, simply plant albino spider lilies, and harvest pods from them. Imbue pods with elemental salts and extracts at a new workbench, create traps out of these pods, or just throw spiders at your foes.

-Supports Vanilla Achievements Expanded.
-Supports SeedsPlease.
-Based on the 'Elder Scrolls' series by Bethesda Game Studios.
-Sounds used made by Mike Koenig from http://soundbible.com/
